labels.name: story
labels.value: Verify That You Can Export Orders To CSV And Send As Email Attachment

name: Validate_Export_Orders_To_CSV_And_Send_As_Email_Attachment

description:
Test Steps:

1- Go To ( https://live.techpanda.org/index.php/backendlogin ) 
2- Login The Credentials Provided
3- Go To Sales-> Orders Menu
4- Select 'Csv' In Export To Dropdown And Click Export Button
5- Read Downloaded File And Display All Order Information In Console Window
6- Attach This Exported File And Email To Another Email Id.

Expected Result:

- Console Displays All Order Information
- Email Is Sent Successfully

Actual Result:

- All Order Information IS Displayed Successfully
- Email Is Sent Successfully

Priority:

- Medium
